Mixed-carbene cyclometalated iridium complexes with saturated blue luminescence †
†Electronic supplementary information (ESI) available: Experimental details, X-ray crystallography summary table, UV-vis excitation spectra, and NMR spectra. CCDC 1879106 and 1879107. For ESI and crystallographic data in CIF or other electronic format see DOI: 10.1039/c9sc01386e
